reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress has great quality, fits snugly, and is comfortable. They appreciate the built-in shapewear feature. The size receives mixed feedback, with several customers noting it runs small. The fabric quality also gets mixed reviews, with one customer describing it as swimsuit material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy dress!
items.body: Had to size up, tricky to get into, but once you’re in, this dress sucks you in, in all the right places! Definitely better for smaller chested girls, because there is not much coverage or strength in the straps. The spandex on the thighs roll up a bit, but it was tolerable! Read more
items.author: Mechell minikus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sexy
items.body: Beautiful, good quality, very sexy. If on the fence? size up. I ordered a Med, should have gotten Large.. haven't received the L yet. I'll update when I do. 5'4" 150, usually a Med, but sometimes still Large. Also, the built in shapeware, game changer.. no need for a bra or anything! This dress is a win. Hoping the Large fits perfectly! I don't even have an event in mind for it, I just want it in my closet just in case something comes up! hahaha! It is that good! Read more
items.author: Deanna Reister

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Maybe size up
items.body: Nice dress! I had a few issues with the shape wear rolling up but other than that the dress looked great Read more
items.author: lovesshoes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING!!!!
items.body: AMAZING, AMAZING, AMAZING!!!! I’m 5’2 and weight 146 got a medium and it fits perfect. Appreciate that when I have to use the restroom, I don’t have to take the whole thing off. Snug just enough to be comfy. Read more
items.author: Marilyn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Flattering!
items.body: The dress has built in shaping without it being too tight. Super flattering! Read more
items.author: Rachel Vidrine

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not worth 130.00
items.body: I was very disappointed. It was really expensive for the fabric of the dress. The threading was already un raveling. And it had so many wrinkles that I am not sure come out. The concept of the dress was nice , it fit snug and did smooth out any rolls on the body and was comfortable. I am going to refurn and get a small. The xs was great minus the chest. The padding was all scrunched and I will need to size up. Also another negative is it picks every every piece of dirt, hair and clings to the dress. Read more
items.author: Courtney dennis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hit with my daughter in law
items.body: Daughter in law loved it Read more
items.author: Mitz Adamson-Kime

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this dress
items.body: I absolutely loooooveee this dress!!! Now I am 5’4 160-165lbs & wear a 36F I ordered a large because that’s what I typically wear however the cup size isn’t the best for me. I should’ve sized up for this. But I am so in love with this dress I’ll use it at the motivation to loose weight! I do wish it was tighter in the lower belly area. The color is phenomenal the fabric is so so so soft I love it. Overall I really like this dress and hopefully I loose the needed weight to wear this! It seems to be really great material too Read more
items.author: Zoe

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Ruched V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal Ruched V Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Leopard, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
